tasks.name: Add onupdateresult event after search/filter
tasks.description: Dispatch onupdateresult event in updateResult function
tasks.strategy: Add dispatch.call(obj, 'onupdateresult', obj, obj.results); after updateCornerPosition.call(obj); in updateResult function

tasks.name: Add onunmerge event and test
tasks.description: Dispatch onunmerge event in removeMerge function and add test
tasks.strategy: Add dispatch.call(obj, 'onunmerge', obj, cellName); in removeMerge function, and add test case in test/merges.ts

tasks.name: Update docs for onunmerge event
tasks.strategy: Add | `onunmerge` | Triggered when merge is removed | in the events table

tasks.name: Enhance onunmerge with beforeMerges
tasks.description: Add beforeMerges parameter to onunmerge event
tasks.strategy: Capture beforeMerges in removeMerge, pass to dispatch, update event type in core.ts, update test

tasks.name: Add type for onunmerge event
tasks.strategy: Add onunmerge?: (instance: WorksheetInstance, cellName: string) => void; in Events interface

tasks.name: Remove support.md
tasks.strategy: Remove the file if it exists

tasks.name: Add support.md and fix minDimensions
tasks.description: Create support.md and fix minDimensions in internal.ts
tasks.strategy: Create docs/jspreadsheet/support.md with content, add check in updateTable: if (obj.options.columns.length < obj.options.minDimensions[0]) obj.options.minDimensions[0] = obj.options.columns.length;

tasks.name: Update README changelog
tasks.strategy: Add '### Custom - Add onupdateresult event after search/filter;' in changelog
